name: Speedy Flower
description:
This is a simple game I made to the 13th UE4 PetitCon held by Historia Inc., in Japan in March 2020.

The theme was "saku", which in Japanese has multiple meanings, such as "blossom", "quick", "fence", among others.

Controls: WASD to move the water ball, Left and Right arrows to move the jar, Space key firest the water ball.
